title: 37  KEY Differences Between THE WITCHES (1990) and THE WITCHES (2020)
author: Think Story
comment:
🧹🧹 So which witch reigns supreme? The original 1990 version or the 2020 remake? 🧹🧹
For more cool horror videos check out my Spooky Horror Playlist: http://y2u.be/5F8ngoG5WjA

The book sure was heckin’ traumatizing. You know it ends with the mouse boy asking his grandmother how long he’ll live, now that he’s a rodent? When his grandma tells him probably no more than 9 years (because he’s a “magical” mouse), he responds with:
“Good, then we’ll die together. I don’t want to live any longer than you do.”
The original was more faithful to the book, so it automatically gets the getter score for me.
Nothing can beat Angelica Houston saying “child is no longer a child...”
This was the remake nobody asked for. Let classics be classics, angelica's performance was untouchable.
description:
The Witches was one of my favorite spooky kids movies so I thought it would be fun to see the main differences with the new HBO Max version starring Anne Hathaway, Octavia Spencer, and Stanley Tucci based off the novel by Roald Dahl.
